mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_CONTENTID as "${columnPrefix}contentId", ${tableAlias}S_TYPE as "${columnPrefix}type", ${tableAlias}S_ROWID as "${columnPrefix}rowId", ${tableAlias}S_COLID as "${columnPrefix}colId", ${tableAlias}I_AREANUMBER as "${columnPrefix}areaNumber"
